FactionLanguages.DialectDef.label: Lingua Latina Nova
FactionLanguages.DialectDef.description: Resurrected, renovated and simplified version of ancient language used even before AD. Was created during Renegade Crisis and used by Renegades Clan after that. Fully replaced standard colonial fleet language in their communications by 5431. \nIt uses 28 letters and 2 special symbols, allowing to avoid pronunciation amiguities and grammar exceptions. Uses many ancient words from various Indo-European languages. \nThe renegades elite still uses ancient Latin as formal and ceremonial language.
